original_text: He also brought two oxen, five male sheep, five male goats, and five male lambs that were less than one year old. Those animals were for the friendship offerings. That was the gift of Eliab, the son of Helon.
korean_text: 화목제물로 소 두 마리와 숫양 다섯 마리와 숫염소 다섯 마리와 일 년 된 어린 숫양 다섯 마리라 이는 헬론의 아들 엘리압의 헌물이었더라

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어린 수컷 양 다섯 마리

sentences.original_text: that were less than one year old
Those animals were for the friendship offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그 동물들은 화목 제물을 위한 것이었습니다

sentences.original_text: That was the gift of Eliab
